title: mail server settings
creator: sscudamore
content: Having downloaded thunderbird onto my Samsung phone the facility to set up mail server is not available. A default setup appears to have been applied, but i cannot access emails properly. My husband and i share same provider and server. He has a Samsung phone and full access to set ups. However Samsung have replaced your app icon with a different icon but still able to access server settings. Thank you. Please advise. Sue Scudamore

title: Escaping HTML in the Email Titles
creator: musicachic
content:
There are certain emails that I get that in the email list display that show escaping HTML instead of data that would be human readable.

Its not all emails but it seems to be emails that maybe also have an image in the body of the email right away that is perhaps in a specific format that it happens.

I will attach screenshots. Target will be my example.
